Good morning everyone~Sorry  the recent market situation must have made everyone worried and panic. Xiao Chen didn't call the head office for a long time and asked some questions yesterday to share with fellow students.(1) The third quarter's financial report will be announced between the end of October and November 7  and the third quarter's revenue growth report.In addition  the 2020 full-year report will be announced around the end of February 2021 next year.(2) The current third quarter revenue should be pretty good  and the fourth quarter should also be expected.The company is now working hard to plan long-term orders. Because of the epidemic  governments of various countries will initially prepare some inventory. The company also plans to sign relatively long-term contracts with major manufacturers.(3) The stock price from single digits to the present is actually a â˜€ï¸basic bullet â˜€ï¸  because regardless of various levels and fluctuations  it will eventually return to the fundamentals.In the past 31 years  the word-of-mouth and marketing channels established by Virtue Xiangbang are not so easy to replicate. In the future  the epidemic will slowly end  and many mask factories may close down  and many anti-epidemic products will slowly fade away.  Word of mouth and marketing channels are not easy to be replaced  and they are very internationally competitive. This is the company's long-term foundation and the company's future profit accumulation  because this epidemic has also made governments of various countries better understand the importance of medical inventory.(4) At present  only mainland China and Taiwan have the means to be self-sufficient in the worldâ€™s epidemic prevention products. Countries in the world  including Europe and the United States  cannot be self-sufficient. They still need professional medical manufacturers to supply them with epidemic prevention materials and epidemic prevention products.  Preparation  so the companyâ€™s products and future are still many opportunities for improvement.(5) In addition  Xiao Chen suggested that the company hope that the company will make a profit in 2020. Not only will the company make a lot of money  but the profit will double this year. He hopes that the company can give investors more profits  including the ratio of allotment dividends  etc.   This is a suggestion for the company  and I hope that everyone can call the head office to respond to the suggestion  so that the health of the entire company and the development and welfare of the company can benefit shareholders and investors and share it with everyone.The above are some questions that Xiao Chen and the company would like to ask.
